Package jp.go.aist.six.oval.model.sc

Defines a Java object model for the elements, types, and attributes that compose the OVAL System Characteristics.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectedSystemObjectsType
    A collection of all the objects that have been collected by the system characteristics file.
    EntityAttributeGroup
    The EntityAttributeGroup is a collection of attributes that are common to all entities.
    EntityItemAnySimpleType
    The EntityItemAnySimple type is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    EntityItemBinaryType
    The EntityItemBinaryType type is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    EntityItemBoolType
    The EntityItemBoolType is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    EntityItemComplexBaseType
    The EntityItemComplexBaseType is an abstract type that serves as the base type for all complex item entities.
    EntityItemEVRStringType
    The EntityItemEVRString type is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    EntityItemFieldType
    The EntityItemFieldType defines an element with simple content that represents a named field in a record that may contain any number of named fields.
    EntityItemFilesetRevisionType
    The EntityItemFilesetRevisionType type is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    EntityItemFloatType

    The EntityItemIPAddressType type is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    EntityItemRecordType
    The EntityItemRecordType defines an entity that consists of a number of named fields.
    EntityItemSimpleBaseType
    The EntityItemBase is an abstract type that serves as the base type for all item entities.
    EntityItemStringType
    The EntityItemString type is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    EntityItemVersionType
    The EntityItemVersion type is extended by the entities of an individual item.
    InterfacesType
    The InterfacesType is a container for zero or more interface elements.
    InterfaceType
    An existing network interface on the system.
    Item

    OvalSystemCharacteristics
    An OVAL System Characteristics Document.
    ReferenceType
    The ItemReference specifies an item in the system characteristics.
    SystemDataType
    The SystemData is a container for one or more item elements.
    SystemInfoType
    General information about the system that data was collected from, including information that can be used to identify the system.
    SystemObjectType
    A reference between items collected and a related global OVAL Object.
    VariableValueType
    The variableValue holds the value to a variable used during the collection of an object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FlagEnumeration
    The Flag enumeration.
    StatusEnumeration
    The Status enumeration defines the valid status messages associated with collection of specific information associated with an item.

Package jp.go.aist.six.oval.model.sc Description

Defines a Java object model for the elements, types, and attributes that compose the OVAL System Characteristics. The Core System Characteristics model defines all operating system independent objects. These objects are extended and enhanced by individual family model.
See Also:
OVAL Language
